title: Yasuo was made for trash
body:
That's why trash players play him LOL

That's why Yasuo always get dumpster, cus that's where trash goes to when they're not needed anymore LOL

replies.body:
Imagine being so funny you laugh at your own jokes uncontrollably

truly a curse more than a blessing
Its true tho. I pitty the kind of human being that plays yasuo and feels good about themselves.

> [{quoted}](name=Wínters Dawn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=w0AfmBY3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-05-10T08:55:50.632+0000)
>
> Its true tho. I pitty the kind of human being that plays yasuo and feels good about themselves.

I hate to say it but I agree. He's the most overtuned champ in the game imo
{{champion:157}} . If he's on the enemy team, he's guaranteed to get a pentakill and he's on your team it's a trashuo
LOL you are so funny AND original LOL
